spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but significant door alignment errors exist. The foyer/entrance area is over-simplified, and the entryway into the living room lacks the wall-depth definition shown in the CAD plan. Window openings in BED-2 are merged rather than keeping specific structural widths.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thicknesses are mostly consistent. However, the connection between the Kitchen and Utility area is misinterpreted; the door to the Utility is misplaced. The balcony/deck attached to BED-1 has an incorrect structural wall termination.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living room furniture mimics the plan well. The BED-1 layout is flipped compared to the CAD (headboard on the wrong wall). Kitchen appliances are simplified cubes lacking the specific stove/sink placement of the source.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with soft, diffuse lighting. Clay-style render provides excellent visual clarity. Minor geometry clipping where some walls meet floors.

detected_errors.description: BED-1 furniture orientation is mirrored/flipped compared to the 2D plan layout.
Utility room door is misplaced relative to the kitchen counter and wall layout.
The foyer area (entrance) is shortened and lacks the specific alcove proportions for the main door.
TOI-1 door is shown swinging into the hallway space in the render rather than into the bathroom as per plan.
The 'DECK' off Bed-1 lacks the specific wall cut-out for the sliding door frame.
